m64tweak.description:
The 3rd Bowser Battle is edited to allow you to use your own Credits level.
After applying open your ROM in Quad64 / ROM Manager and go to the 3 Bowser Battle. Under warps you should now see a 3rd warp leading to "End Cake Picture" (or it's "Unknown") Simply change the warp to every level you want and the grand star will lead you there.
